data: combat component large mandatory ship_kha_l_destroyer_01 weapon

Forged from the darkest depths of Kha'ak technology, the Ravager Main Battery harnesses the raw energy of the cosmos to generate a focused particle beam of unparalleled potency. Each searing blast from its menacing barrel strikes with pinpoint accuracy, tearing through the defences of capital ships with ease.\n\nDesigned to deliver devastating blows against enemy capital vessels, this weapon serves as the primary armament of Kha'ak Destroyers, ensuring their dominance on the battlefield. Its overwhelming firepower and relentless precision make it a fearsome adversary for any enemy of the Kha'ak.
